metadata.name: Ryo Konishi DAO - PATTERN COLLECTION #1
metadata.description: The Pattern Collection is a Merchandise-specific generative art collection with trademark usage rights attached to every piece.  The Pattern Collection is a one-of-a-kind collection of generative art that is created at the time of minting, and the following utilities are granted equally to the owners  Ryo Konishi DAO membership  - Owner role in Ryo Konishi DAO  - Merchandise platform lineup (dropshipping)  - Individual consulting room dedicated to apparel brand startups  - Merchandise specific updates as needed  - Online design school  - Full access to all of the original data  - Design school Online design school  - A set of files with all layers of the original data as individual materials  - Owner's revenue from all earnings of the Owner's brand  - A right to acquire merchandising sales channels in the real gallery shop ART DRIVEN BASE  - Creative in the developing metaverse Gogh Land Generation and sales of new NFTs through pattern collection wrapping function in the studio   Benefits of Ryo Konishi DAO  - This NFT owner will have access to Ryo Konishi DAO's MERCHANDISE channel  - This NFT owner will have access to Ryo Konishi DAO's MTG TABLE channel  - This NFT owner has access to Ryo Konishi DAO's BEACH CLUB (IRL community)  Ryo Konishi DAO is a self-sustaining, decentralized art studio of artists who enjoy working together to increase the value of the NFTs they produce, and to increase their own personal influence. Please join us! →https://discord.gg/H3z4z25J
